languageSpecifications.txt_set_main_password: Set your password. It must contain at least 14 characters a capital and special character.
languageSpecifications.setup_txt_set_burn_password: PEM also uses a brun password. Using this password will erase all contacts and conversations. This cannot be undone.
languageSpecifications.txt_set_pincode: Set PINCODE. To restore your account later.
languageSpecifications.setup_txt_logoff_timer: This app will log off the app automatically is no action has been registered after:
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-1:
EVERY USER HAS A UNIQUE ID.

IF YOU WANT TO ADD A CONTACT, YOU NEED HIS/HER UNIQUE ID.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-2:
NEXT STEP IS TO SET A SECRET KEY
TO ENCRYPT YOUR CONVERSATION.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-3:
THE CONTACTS YOU ARE SENDING
MESSAGE TO, NEED TO KNOW THIS
KEY TO ENCRYPT THE MESSAGES.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-4:
YOU START A CONVERSATION,
BY CLICKING ON A CONTACT IN THE
CONTACTSLIST.
languageSpecifications.swiper-txt-5:
EXPLANATION ABOUT THE SAFETY OF THE APP.

THEREFORE IT IS IMPORTANT TO
SET THE LOG OFF TIMER AND
THE BURN PASSWORD.

languageSpecifications.txt_logoff_timer: Set your log off time by rolling through the menu. The app will automatically stop is not active for that period of time. Any conversation in concept will be eased after loggin in again.
languageSpecifications.txt_notification: Choose which notifications you want to receive
languageSpecifications.txt_shake_logoff: Shake your device and the app will stop immediately. After restarting the app changes will be processed.

languageSpecifications.contactaddtxt: If you don't have somebody you can Add TEST contact.
languageSpecifications.howtogetsupporttext: How to get support anonymous? click 'Add support contact' and the support contact will be added to your contact list. Send like a normal message 'the key is set automatic' so support can read and answer to the message. if you done you can remove the support contact from your list. Support will never send you message only will reply!
languageSpecifications.howtogetsupportalert:
SUPPORT ADDED SUCCESSFULLY
Now you can chat secure with us if you have some bugs - tips or else. Whene you don't want SUPPORT anymore you can delete the contact to swipe from right to left.
languageSpecifications.testaccountadded:
TEST UID ADDED SUCCESSFULLY
